movie.title: Django Unchained
movie.actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
movie.plot: Former dentist, Dr. King Schultz, buys the freedom of a slave, Django, and trains him with the intent to make him his deputy bounty hunter. Instead, he is led to the site of Django's wife who is under the hands of Calvin Candie, a ruthless plantation owner.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Bold, bloody, and stylistically daring, Django Unchained is another incendiary masterpiece from Quentin Tarantino.
